actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to clarify and extend the provisions relating to foreign repair of vessels.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Act of 1930 to exempt from the imposition of duties the cost of spare parts installed on U.S. vessels before entry into the United States, but only if a duty is paid under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States on each such spare part purchased in, or imported from, a foreign country. Amends the Customs and Trade Act of 1990 to extend such exemption for entries made on or before December 31, 1994.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Act of 1930 to clarify and extend the provisions relating to foreign repair of vessels.
